a.title: Express view on China-India thaw: Patient diplomacy is key

h4.a: Express view on China-India thaw: Patient diplomacy is key

div.div: The complexity of the relationship and the differences between the two countries should not deter future engagement, as a safer border and better economic ties are on the table. Both Delhi and Beijing have much to gain. They just need to relate to each other better -- as soon as possible

img.alt: listing-Express view on China-India thaw: Patient diplomacy is key

a.title: Express view on RBI report: State finances have improved, but there is a lot of work to be done

h4.a: Express view on RBI report: State finances have improved, but there is a lot of work to be done

div.div: Post covid, states have brought down their debt to 28.5 per cent and their deficit to 2.9 per cent. This is an encouraging development. But power distribution companies, for one, have suffered significant losses, that cannot be overlooked

img.alt: listing-Express view on RBI report: State finances have improved, but there is a lot of work to be done

a.title: The Third edit: India and Pakistan will mourn the loss of no matches in the host country

h4.a: The Third edit: India and Pakistan will mourn the loss of no matches in the host country

div.div: The age-old rivalry will take stage in the Dubai or Colombo stadiums, but it will miss the energy of an Eden Gardens in Kolkata or a Gaddafi in Lahore

img.alt: listing-The Third edit: India and Pakistan will mourn the loss of no matches in the host country

a.title: The Third edit | Googly eyes on murals: Making public art more public

h4.a: The Third edit | Googly eyes on murals: Making public art more public

div.div: Art, when taken out of the gallery space, makes it more accessible, and gives the viewer an opportunity to engage with it - maybe even toy with it and that’s not a bad thing.

img.alt: listing-The Third edit | Googly eyes on murals: Making public art more public

a.title: Express view on US Fed cut: A signal to RBI to rework policy

h4.a: Express view on US Fed cut: A signal to RBI to rework policy

div.div: Reverberations from the Fed’s actions were felt across markets. With Trump’s second administration presenting economic ambiguity, India’s policy choices narrow down - pressure intensifies but sinking isn’t an option.

img.alt: listing-Express view on US Fed cut: A signal to RBI to rework policy

a.title: Express view on battle over Ambedkar: Debate his legacy, don’t indulge in sound-byte tokenism

h4.a: Express view on battle over Ambedkar: Debate his legacy, don’t indulge in sound-byte tokenism

div.div: In the more than 30 years of his public life, Ambedkar contested the ideas and actions of almost every major political stream of his times - but now, Parliament’s theatertical back and forth over his legacy is reductive.

img.alt: listing-Express view on battle over Ambedkar: Debate his legacy, don’t indulge in sound-byte tokenism

a.title: India’s exports fall — and tariff barriers loom

h4.a: India’s exports fall — and tariff barriers loom

div.div: During the first Trump presidency, India had lost duty-free access. Considering the implications of his possible trade moves, India must deftly navigate this period of uncertainty

img.alt: listing-India’s exports fall — and tariff barriers loom

a.title: The Third Edit: Well played, R Ashwin

h4.a: The Third Edit: Well played, R Ashwin

div.div: The real measure of Ashwin as a player was the immense respect he was shown by batsmen. They knew that he was not dependent on the pitch to bamboozle batsmen and possessed all the tricks

img.alt: listing-The Third Edit: Well played, R Ashwin

a.title: Punjab’s growing agrarian crisis and a renewed farmers’ agitation

h4.a: Punjab’s growing agrarian crisis and a renewed farmers’ agitation

div.div: Both the state and central governments must join hands with farmer leaders to find a way forward. Problems left unresolved for too long often have unintended and unfortunate consequences

img.alt: listing-Punjab’s growing agrarian crisis and a renewed farmers’ agitation

a.title: Express view on President Dissanayake’s India visit: Building bridges with Sri Lanka

h4.a: Express view on President Dissanayake’s India visit: Building bridges with Sri Lanka

div.div: Sensitive issues concerning fishing rights and minorities are priority discussions to be had. With National People’s Power’s win ushering in a new government in Sri Lanka, it will be important for Colombo and Delhi to effectively communicate and pass a resolution

img.alt: listing-Express view on President Dissanayake’s India visit: Building bridges with Sri Lanka

a.title: Express view on T M Krishna row: SC order undermines artistic freedom

h4.a: Express view on T M Krishna row: SC order undermines artistic freedom

div.div: Krishna has consistently pushed the boundaries of Carnatic music by questioning orthodoxy and advocating for diversity and social justice. Does his intellectual criticism of M S Subbulakshmi’s legacy undo his significant contributions to the artform?

img.alt: listing-Express view on T M Krishna row: SC order undermines artistic freedom

a.title: The Third edit | Popeye, Tintin: The free to use icons this New Years

h4.a: The Third edit | Popeye, Tintin: The free to use icons this New Years

div.div: The nostalgia behind these characters has found a new home as they go out of copyright in a few weeks but there is a time and place for characters of the past -- teaching old dogs new tricks can’t be sustainable

img.alt: listing-The Third edit | Popeye, Tintin: The free to use icons this New Years

a.title: The Third Edit: For a cooler mind, politics and Earth — touch grass

h4.a: The Third Edit: For a cooler mind, politics and Earth — touch grass

div.div: TikTok has managed to do damage worth an entire nation’s energy demands by producing a larger carbon footprint than Greece. Maybe it’s time to put your phone down

img.alt: listing-The Third Edit: For a cooler mind, politics and Earth — touch grass

a.title: Thomas Piketty has the right diagnosis, wrong prescription

h4.a: Thomas Piketty has the right diagnosis, wrong prescription

div.div: India needs to reduce inequality of opportunity, and invest in health and education. Taxing the wealth of the rich could prove counterproductive

img.alt: listing-Thomas Piketty has the right diagnosis, wrong prescription

a.title: Thank You, Ustad Zakir Hussain

h4.a: Thank You, Ustad Zakir Hussain

div.div: He saw himself as a lifelong student. His quest to find new sounds made tabla one of India’s biggest cultural exports.

img.alt: listing-Thank You, Ustad Zakir Hussain

a.title: Inflation has eased — but only for some

h4.a: Inflation has eased — but only for some

div.div: The relief in headline numbers hides wide variation across the geographies and economic classes

img.alt: listing-Inflation has eased — but only for some

a.title: At 75, India’s Constitution is mature, flexible and open to bear the weight of many voices

h4.a: At 75, India’s Constitution is mature, flexible and open to bear the weight of many voices

div.div: Across the political spectrum, the respect for independent India’s founding document is intact. Maintaining its values requires continuous conversation and dialogue of the kind witnessed in Parliament

img.alt: listing-At 75, India’s Constitution is mature, flexible and open to bear the weight of many voices

a.title: The Third edit: Why food ratings commit an injustice to taste

h4.a: The Third edit: Why food ratings commit an injustice to taste

div.div: The Taste Atlas Awards feature the top 100 popular cuisines like Italian and Indian but it lacks the most important ingredient of all - a serendipitous journey that your regular foodie makes

img.alt: listing-The Third edit: Why food ratings commit an injustice to taste

a.title: Express view: On temples, mosques and history, a welcome order

h4.a: Express view: On temples, mosques and history, a welcome order

div.div: As we commemorate the 75th year of the Constitution, the future of the Places of Worship Act lies in the hands of the Supreme Court and they could very well decide the role of history in shaping this diverse nation’s future

img.alt: listing-Express view: On temples, mosques and history, a welcome order

a.title: In D Gukesh’s World Championship win lies Indian chess’s immense possibilities

h4.a: In D Gukesh’s World Championship win lies Indian chess’s immense possibilities

div.div: India’s second world champion may underplay his young age. But in it lies the promise of even greater things

img.alt: listing-In D Gukesh’s World Championship win lies Indian chess’s immense possibilities

a.title: The Third Edit: Donald Trump’s suggestion that Canada become a US state is trolling as diplomacy

h4.a: The Third Edit: Donald Trump’s suggestion that Canada become a US state is trolling as diplomacy

div.div: When Trump was first elected in 2016, his detractors in the US threatened to ‘move to Canada’. Perhaps, this belittling is also a means to get even and get over some hurt sentiments

img.alt: listing-The Third Edit: Donald Trump’s suggestion that Canada become a US state is trolling as diplomacy

a.title: Mapping of foetus’s brain at IIT-Madras can yield significant breakthroughs

h4.a: Mapping of foetus’s brain at IIT-Madras can yield significant breakthroughs

div.div: Several studies have suggested that brain development may be particularly vulnerable. A mother’s health, educational, nutritional and environmental needs must be met to ensure that her child’s body and brain develop healthily

img.alt: listing-Mapping of foetus’s brain at IIT-Madras can yield significant breakthroughs

a.title: What sluggish salaries and slowdown in Indian economy might mean

h4.a: What sluggish salaries and slowdown in Indian economy might mean

div.div: It is not generating productive opportunities for people entering the labour market

img.alt: listing-What sluggish salaries and slowdown in Indian economy might mean

a.title: Express view on Foreign Secretary’s Bangladesh visit: Reaching out to Dhaka

h4.a: Express view on Foreign Secretary’s Bangladesh visit: Reaching out to Dhaka

div.div: It was important to put Delhi’s concerns over minority rights on the side during the meeting - this is the first of many steps that has to be taken to maintain the harmonious alliance

img.alt: listing-Express view on Foreign Secretary’s Bangladesh visit: Reaching out to Dhaka

a.title: The Third edit: ‘Word of the Year’ — dictionaries fight for relevance

h4.a: The Third edit: ‘Word of the Year’ — dictionaries fight for relevance

div.div: We live in a time where social media deems phenomenons worthy of global attention. Can a year-ending dictionary report compete with this?

img.alt: listing-The Third edit: ‘Word of the Year’ — dictionaries fight for relevance
Express shorts
India women vs West Indies women 1st ODI Smriti mandhana renuka singh

div.a: Mandhana finds a support cast, Renuka Singh Thakur gets a five-for in India’s thumping win

a.p: India's new international stadium in Vadodara hosted a thrilling ODI match between India and West Indies on Sunday. India's Harmanpreet Kaur, returning after an injury, led the team to a dominating 212-run victory. Smriti Mandhana's 91 runs and debutant Pratika Rawal's 40 set the foundation for India's impressive total of 314/9. West Indieswere eventually bowled out for 103.
